org.franca.core.framework

Class TransformationIssue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.framework.TransformationIssue

  • public class TransformationIssue
extends java.lang.Object
    This class decribes an issue that occurred during a model transformation to/from Franca. It contains all data necessary to analyse the issue after the transformation has been executed. Note: The current implementation relies on the source model of the model transformation being an EMF ecore model.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FEATURE_IS_IGNORED

      static int FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
      Issue id: A feature of the source model is not supported by the transformation.
      static int FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED_VALUE
      Issue id: A certain value of a source model's feature is not supported.
      static int IMPORT_ERROR
      Issue id: Some error was detected when importing into Franca, the imported model is not consistent.
      static int IMPORT_WARNING
      Issue id: Some non critical inconsistency was detected when importing into Franca, the imported model is not consistent.

    • Field Detail

      • FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED

        public static final int FEATURE_NOT_SUPPORTED
        Issue id: A feature of the source model is not supported by the transformation. The information stored in this feature will be lost deliberately. If you want to fix this in a later release of the transformation, use issue id FEATURE_NOT_HANDLED_YET instead.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEATURE_IS_IGNORED

        public static final int FEATURE_IS_IGNORED
        Issue id: A feature of the source model is ignored deliberately. A reason for this might be that the corresponding information will be stored in a deployment model instead of an IDL model.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED_VALUE

        public static final int FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED_VALUE
        Issue id: A certain value of a source model's feature is not supported. This could be an issue on instance level, not on meta level.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEATURE_NOT_HANDLED_YET

        public static final int FEATURE_NOT_HANDLED_YET
        Issue id: A feature of the source model is not handled yet, but should be. This indicates that the transformation flaw will be fixed in a future version of the transformation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEATURE_NOT_FULLY_SUPPORTED

        public static final int FEATURE_NOT_FULLY_SUPPORTED
        Issue id: A feature of the source model is not fully supported. Some information can be lost or the whole information can be lost for certain cases.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMPORT_ERROR

        public static final int IMPORT_ERROR
        Issue id: Some error was detected when importing into Franca, the imported model is not consistent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IMPORT_WARNING

        public static final int IMPORT_WARNING
        Issue id: Some non critical inconsistency was detected when importing into Franca, the imported model is not consistent.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransformationIssue

        public TransformationIssue(int reason,
                   org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject obj,
                   int featureId,
                   java.lang.String detail)
        Constructor for Issue objects
        Parameters:
        reason - the issue id (see definitions FEATURE_... for details)
        obj - the EObject which triggered the issue (or its EClass)
        featureId - the EMF feature id (from the ecore-model's EPackage)
        detail - optional: detail string, typically a feature's runtime value

    • Method Detail

      • getReason

        public int getReason()
        Get the reason for this issue. See issue id definition for further details.
        Returns:
        issue id

      • getDetail

        public java.lang.String getDetail()
        Get the detail string for this issue. If there is no detail, an empty string will be returned.
        Returns:
        detail string, might be empty

      • getFeatureString

        public java.lang.String getFeatureString()
        A human-readable representation of the feature where this issue occurred. The detail string is not included, just the type of the feature, its class and the name of the feature itself.
        Returns:
        a string with the feature description.
